content:
site_name: HyperCode
site_url: https://welshdog.github.io/hypercode/
repo_url: https://github.com/welshDog/hypercode

theme:
  name: material
  features:
    - navigation.tabs
    - navigation.indexes
    - toc.integrate
    - content.code.annotate

markdown_extensions:
  - admonition
  - codehilite
  - toc:
      permalink: true
  - pymdownx.superfences
  - pymdownx.highlight
  - pymdownx.arithmatex

nav:
  - Home: index.md
  - Getting Started:
      - Installation: getting-started/installation.md
      - First Program: getting-started/first-program.md
  - Language Reference:
      - Syntax: reference/syntax.md
      - Types: reference/types.md
      - Standard Library: reference/stdlib.md
  - Examples:
      - Hello World: examples/hello.md
      - Fibonacci: examples/fibonacci.md
      - OOP: examples/oop.md
  - Contributing:
      - Code Style: contributing/code-style.md
      - Development Setup: contributing/dev-setup.md

extra_css:
  - css/extra.css
